You can't fight for long if you're poisoned.
Use Squelch to cure it!

Use party members with high Move to
manoeuvre around enemies in the back!

Upgrade abilities with upgrade tomes!
Abilities can be upgraded up to +10!

Watch out for these!
They can move 4 <IfSing_4(space,spaces)>
and cast spells from afar!
Use area attacks to strike them all down!

Being blinded makes it harder to hit
with physical and martial attacks!

Use party members with high Move to
manoeuvre around enemies in the back.

You can check pots
if you are next to them.
What's inside is a surprise!
